meanings.sent1: She carefully resmoothed the table after spilling juice on it.

meanings.definition: The act of making something smooth again.
meanings.sent1: The resmoothing of the floor made it safe to walk on again.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the resmoothing of the fabric after it was ironed.
meanings.sent3: The resmoothing of the ice rink made skating much more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The resmoothing of the road reduced the noise of passing cars.
meanings.sent5: The resmoothing of the paper made it easier to write on.
